title: New season new chances! (HELP ME)
body:
Hello all, 

Im currently a silver 4 player ( most of the time silver 3 tough ) and im really starting to enjoy playing and growing my skills and knowledge about the game.. 
Now it is not working for me that well and i would like some help. 
Im not asking for anything like duo playing or boosting im just asking for some honest advice for getting better. 
Maybe help me out and watch a few games with me and help evaluate what just happend and how i could improve that and my skills. 
I really hope someone can so i could finally climb the ladder in season 7 !!!! 

ty in advance for taking your time and love to hear from you very soon!

replies.body:
Came across this tip a while ago.

Say either out loud or in your head what you are going to do next and why you are doing it.  

Even if you don't know what to do next this will help you avoid stupid mistakes like overstaying after taking a tower or inhib and dieing or face checking their jungler.  

Another tip is to start tracking cooldowns (yours and enemys) and making plays off of it.

Lets take annie mid.  
Every time your ulti is up try and do something with it.  Kill laner, push and gank bot or top, push and get some jungle vision etc.

Start tracking enemy sums (if you blow at the same time remeber they will have it up roughly the same time) and forcing things while they don't have them.

Then track enemy ulti cds and if they have longer spells (darius pull is 18ish sec, blitz pull is 20 sec, yas windwall etc).  This requires much more knowledge of the champion base but once you have it down it makes trading way easier because you always know exactly what the enemy can do at any given time.  

I would also recommend playing every champion at least a couple of times so you know both sides of matchups.  This also makes it waaay easier to recognize their weaknesses and what opportunities you find when playing against them.

This have worked for me very much! In the new season i have climbed from bronze 4 ( were i used to be silver 4) to silver 2 and in my promos to silver 1! it works but very slowly tough. I think its very hard to always make the best decision. But im trying my best to get better and its working! thank you very much for your time i appreciate it a lot! if u have any other tips they are indeed very welcoming! 
again thank you very much!
When I get home I will look over a replay if you have one

Im sorry for the late reaction. I havent been able to play that much lately. But now im back on track and if the offer is still open i would really like if u could help me. Some advice already helped me but im now in my promos to silver 1 already! i really wanna hit that gold up next week! maybe this could help me out!
